Description: Kenilworth Towers Apartments located in Bladensburg, MD offers spacious studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep – MetroBus R12 stops here and a 3-minute walk to F1, F2, F8, T14 and T18 with service to 7 metro stations. 3 minutes to the Baltimore-Washington Parkway or New York Avenue. Very close to shopping, errands, and restaurants for everyday living. 5-10 minutes to Arts District Hyattsville, historic Mt. Rainier and the Mall at Prince George’s. Moments to great parks, recreation and entertainment at Bladensburg Community Center and Bladensburg Waterfront Park. Apartment features include a big and bright living area with space for lots of furniture, sliding glass doors that open to a covered balcony or patio, large separate dining area with ceiling fan, kitchen with fridge, gas range and space for a bistro table, tons of storage space with walk-in and long wall closets. Blinds provided. Gas and most electricity utilities included in rent – you pay water and sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck, play area, lobby, elevators, trash chute, telephone entry system, laundry on each floor or large central facility, mail delivery in each building, on-site management and 24-hour maintenance office. For more information and availability, visit www.kenilworthtowers.com.

Description: Quincy Village is a small enclave of only twenty one spacious apartment homes, nestled in a wooded setting, convenient to all amenities. From a close-to-everything address, to a picture-perfect landscapes and bordering wonderlands, Quincy Village is the right place at the right time. Your new home awaits. Our professionally trained management and maintenance teams are here for you, plus for your convenience we offer 24 hour emergency maintenance service. Located nearby: US Post Office, Washington Navy Yard, Andrews Field, Med-Ped Health Care, LLC, Elite Care Clinic, Fortis College, University Of Maryland, Gallaudet University, Howard University, Bladensburg Waterfront Park, Anacostia River Park, Burlington Park, Cheverly Local Park, Dodge Park, Community Shop N Go Center, Capital Plaza Mall, Glenridge Shopping Center, Museum Resource Center National Park, AMC Magic Johnson Capital Center 12, Prince George's Hospital Center, CVS/Pharmacy, Walgreens, Walmart/Pharmacy, Dunkin' Donuts & Starbucks.

Description: Newton Green is a 78 unit senior affordable* rental community in Bladensburg, Maryland. The development is located on a 6.9 acre hillside site in Bladensburg, less than 5 miles from the nation's capitol. The development is comprised of 78 units - 63 one-bedroom apartments and 15 two-bedroom apartments. Twelve of the units are fully accessible and were built specifically to house handicapped seniors.Each oversized unit features a fully equipped kitchen, wood cabinets, ENERGY STAR appliances, ample closet space, ceramic tiled baths, neutral carpeting, individual central heat and air conditioning, and cable and internet access. All units are reserved for seniors who are 62 years of age or older. Newton Green offers numerous development amenities along with a complete resident services plan that is overseen by Housing Initiative Partnership, Inc. Development amenities include: fitness center, computer lab, activity center, library/lounge area that opens into an exterior patio area. *NOTE: Affordable housing, low-to-moderate income restrictions apply.

Description:
Set back from the bustle of Annapolis Road, this 5-acre private enclave of beautifully landscaped grounds is home to our garden-style community, offering a close-knit sense of belonging and a clean, comfortable environment that you will be proud to call home. Once you step outside of our community, you will find all the conveniences within an easy walk or a quick drive. If you are looking to come apply, please bring:
- Current Driver's Licence or Photo ID
- Social Security Card or TAX ID
- Two Most Recent Pay Stubs If You Are Paid Bi-Weekly (Four If Paid Weekly)
-$35 Application Fee (Money Order or Certified Cashier's Check; non-refundable)
- $500 Minimum Security Deposit (Goes Toward Full Deposit and Reserves Apartment; Money Order or Certified Cashier's Check) *pricing and availability may change at any time*

Description: This beautifully landscaped garden-style community offers the ultimate in convenience, with groceries, restaurants and more just across a quiet street at the Bladensburg Shopping Center. Hillcrest Terrace Apartments is a welcoming community, just small enough to feel a real sense of belonging, and our around-the-clock service team is committed to ensuring that your community is clean and comfortable, and that you are proud to call Hillcrest Terrace your home.
Newly renovated Stainless steel appliances Ready for new occupant
